titleStmt.title: An Exact collection of farewel sermons preached by the late London-ministers viz. Mr. Calamy, Mr. Watson, Mr. Jacomb, Mr. Case, Mr. Sclater, Mr. Baxter, Mr. Jenkin, Dr. Manton, Mr. Lye, Mr. Collins : to which is added their prayers before and after sermon as also Mr. Calamy's sermon for which he was imprisoned in Newgate : his sermon at Mr. Ashe's funeral and Dr. Horton's and Mr. Nalton's funeral.
titleStmt.author: Calamy, Edmund, 1600-1666.

editionStmt.edition: The last edition, being much enlarged and more perfect than any yet extant.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
